title: The 'Indrani' Diamond Vaddanam with Emerald Drops
materials: 18K Yellow Gold with Hyderabadi Polish. Features baguette cut diamonds (VVS Clarity
E-F Color) and natural Zambian emeralds. The emeralds are cabochon cut.
features: A stunning Vaddanam featuring a central diamond-encrusted motif inspired by traditional Andhra artistry. The repeating pattern of baguette diamonds creates a modern, streamlined look. Delicate emerald drops embellish the bottom edge, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The focal point showcases a geometric design with emerald accents.
colors: with accents of vibrant green (emeralds) and warm yellow gold.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions such as weddings (Vivaha)
and high-profile social gatherings. Also suitable for a modern fusion look at festive events.
description: This 'Indrani' Vaddanam perfectly marries tradition with modern design sensibilities. The exceptional quality of diamonds and emeralds, combined with meticulous craftsmanship, makes it a timeless heirloom piece. This stunning accessory exudes opulence and cultural significance, making the wearer the epitome of South Indian grace and elegance.
